name: Escape Room (itch) (OrdiGe)
description:
You are an escape room fanatic, and you’ve heard about the best escape room ever. It’s said to be so realistic that people actually went insane after they got out. So.. What are you waiting for?

(PLAY FULL SCREEN)

Forward: W 

Backward: S 

Left: A 

Right: D 

Interact: E 

Camera movement: Mouse
